definition: chop or cut with an axe
sentence: they will hew the timber in the forest

definition: cut off (something such as hair, wool, or grass), with scissors
sentence: the spines were sheared off of the cactus

definition: a place giving temporary protection from bad weather or danger
sentence: we must find shelter to be safe from the storm
his vessel will carry us across the sea

definition: a colorless, transparent liquid that forms the seas
sentence: the bucket of water put out the fire
